name: It201_Project1_Anthony_Pronti
description: The user can create a 3D object or 3D objects when the user left clicks or holds the right click then drags on the screen. It spawns 3D objects from user input and destroys 3D objects after a set time (3 seconds). The user is able to change the amount of color, between red, blue, and green in the created object. The system also provides the cursors position.
